param.label: Number of nodes
param.name: nodes
param.help: Number of compute nodes to use, '--nodes' value (1-4). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Number of cores to use
param.name: ntasks
param.help: Number of processing cores, '--ntasks' value (1-64). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Memory per core in Megabytes
param.name: memory
param.help: Memory size in gigabytes, '--mem-per-cpu' value (1-94). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Estimated runtime Time
param.name: time
param.help: Maximum job time in hours, '--time' value (1-189). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Project
param.name: project
param.help: Project to assign resource allocation to.
param.option: Select the project you want to run the job
